mapper.insert: insert into t_board_cmt(iboard, iuser, ctnt) values (${iboard}, ${iuser}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: select A.*, B.nm as writernm, B.profileimg from t_board_cmt A left join t_user B on A.iuser = B.iuser where iboard = ${iboard} order by A.icmt
mapper.delete: delete from t_board_cmt where icmt = ${icmt} and iuser = ${iuser}
